name: Heart of the Kingdom: Rebellion
description:
You have to become a wise governor or a great conqueror. Fighting with other players for resources and incredible artifacts. Don't forget about the economy. Develop your settlement and one day you will succeed. Maybe...

Features:
  • Broad development opportunities.
  • Unique abilities of heroes.
  • Сastles with unique stages of development.
  • Atmospheric music.
  • Unique combat system.
